decks.notes: The deck focuses on utilizing Niv-Mizzet Reborn as a powerful control tool, supported by a variety of multicolor cards that can be fetched using Bring to Light. The inclusion of Leyline Binding and Vanishing Verse allows for removal options, while the mana base is designed to support the various color requirements of the deck. The deck also includes versatile cards such as Yorion, Sky Nomad and Hostage Taker for additional flexibility and disruption. Overall, the deck aims to control the game through a combination of card advantage, removal, and powerful threats.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy while aggressively attacking with efficient creatures and burn spells. The deck includes disruptive cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push to control the opponent's hand and board, while Blazemire Verge and Unholy Annex/Ritual Chamber provide additional aggression. Bloodtithe Harvester and Blade of the Oni serve as powerful threats, while cards like Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse offer late-game power. The deck aims to close out games quickly through a combination of creature damage and burn spells.

This deck revolves around assembling the Lotus Field combo to generate a large amount of mana quickly. Key pieces include Vizier of Tumbling Sands and Hidden Strings to untap Lotus Field multiple times, along with ways to tutor for Lotus Field and other combo pieces like Sylvan Scrying and Dark Petition. The deck also includes powerful spells like Emergent Ultimatum and Omniscience to further advance its game plan. The goal is to set up a dominant position by generating an overwhelming amount of resources and spells to overwhelm the opponent.
